about_the_game:
Defend the galaxy! You are Nick Duster, better known as "IcoNick", a war veteran of the intergalactic congregation, who has been brought back to defend the planets from hostile alliances.

Different galaxies are under attack and you will be hired for different missions, repel asteroid belts and possible invasions of alien fleets to avoid a possible war.

Control your turret, with high firepower, to destroy everything that moves.

The congregation will send you supplies with support ships.

Destroy gigantic bosses and all ships that are hostile.

Ship shooting game, with 1 game mode in Demo.

Asteroids - Total elimination to avoid damage to facilities.

Quick games full of action and strategy. Get to level up, rank up and prestige to get your highest badge.

Help Nick fight the congregation's enemies.

Peace in the galaxy depends on you, even if you have to go on missions to all of them!

Hundreds of galaxies await your help.

name: IcoNick Duster - Planets Defender Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nick Duster, better known as "IcoNick", a war veteran of the intergalactic congregation, who has been brought back to defend the planets from hostile alliances. Control your turret, with high firepower. 1 game mode: Only "Asteroids" available in Demo. Full of action. Hundreds of galaxies awaits. Go!
